<MethodEndpoint

Returns a link specified in the request in the shortened format.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"link":{"type":"string","description":"Link","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"Shortened link request parameters","title":"ASC.Web.Api.ApiModel.RequestsDto.ShortenLinkRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
